column5: I bought a 587ci (w/out downscan) 2 years ago and I know i am not using it to its potential. Are you aware of any seminars or info places to help me learn how to properly use it?
Why not just take it back to where you bought it originally and have them explain it to you Pete ??

If you live in the Hamilton area. At our club meeting on Feb. 28th. we have a guy doing a GPS seminar If this interests you. Your more than welcome to attend. I know you said your depth finder GPS combo. I have the same machine, and just getting familiar with it myself. Just trying to help.
Google it, I am sure that there are videos available.

this seminar was recorded recently and posted on youtube, there is over a dozen parts, here is the first to get you started  <iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/KqCaCgLkMFE" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
Hey, the GPS seminar would be great!  I live in Grimsby.  Where and what time on the 28th?

Our next Stelco Fishing Club meeting is Feb.28th,2012 Held at the R.H.L.I. 1353 Barton St. East. Doors open at 6:30 pm. meeting at 7:00pm. Your more than welcome to come out Pete. Come introduce yourself. Doesn't cost anything to come in. We have free draw Prizes, plus separate draws if you want. Bring a friend if you want. Dave on shirt.
